content: Good selection of stuff, I can almost always find what I need through the app. The app can be buggy though, since the update I can't seem to log in to link to my bank account anymore. Their troubleshooting instructions were useless. Also I do not appreciate the shipping address changing back to default upon checkout even though I specified a different address when adding to cart, had to cancel an order, and now I have to wait for the money to be refunded to reorder. Waste of time.
replayContent: We apologize for the inconvenience you've experienced. To resolve the login and address issues, please try uninstalling and reinstalling the app, ensuring it has all necessary permissions. Thank you for your feedback.

content: I've always been impressed with the convenience of shopping on tokopedia and the fast delivery times. The website is user-friendly and makes it easy to find what I need. One area for improvement could be the organization of product listings. Sometimes it can be overwhelming to sift through numerous options, especially when searching for specific items. Implementing better filters or sorting options could greatly enhance the shopping experience and make it even more efficient for customers.

content: Edit: Most of the time there is no other shipping option aside from the "Local Standard Delivery Service". We don't really get a choice. content: Please provide users with the option to delete their account if they no longer use the tokopedia application. Or at least delete the phone number. Why? If the phone number is deactivated or the service is terminated, it will be recycled for a new owner. The new owner could then log in to the old tokopedia user's account. Personal information such as address, full name, purchase history, and others will be exposed to the new user.

content: I didn't received my lazrewards after receiving my order. Been loyal and using this app for years now I'm uninstalling it and moving to another app.

content: This app allows sellers to scam buyers with devious, deceptive pricing. For example, a lowered price will appear and then upon purchase a much higher price is there. Refund, returns, cancel and lazpay is set up for customers to lose. Recently a seller would not refund me my money after a wrong item arrived. I contacted tokopedia customer service about it and the whole ordeal was a joke to them. Good thing I paid with my credit card and was able to report them for fraud.

Please reach out to us via the tokopedia in app help centre, if you have any query. We look forward to serve you again.

content: Latest 05.12 update adds awful animations between screens. Guys, I am telling you as experienced Android Developer - you need to fix them (black background appears among every animation; animations are too long; animation from center to the edges makes me feel vomiting physically, no offence). Just removing these new animations is a good option too, heh
replayContent: Thanks for your review. We try to pay attention to everything, and your input helps us understand the priorities and better the app more effectively. Stay tuned for the following updates!

content: The app is good overall, it's just that the delivery couriers were not notifying the buyers throgh text or call if the delivery fails. And also, the courier is always setting the failed delivery status as "Customer is not at the delivery address" even if they didn't actually go to that address, so it seems like the customer is at fault for the failed delivery. Buyers should also be able to get the contact details of the courier who picked up the package so they can directly ask what happened.
replayContent: We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Our team is working on improving the communication between couriers and customers to ensure timely notifications about failed deliveries. We appreciate your feedback and will consider adding the option to contact the courier directly for better assistance.

content: If you get a good deal, the seller won't ship it and the app won't do anything about it. Why make coupons if you wont even let people use them

content: Any Choice is useless. My 1st try of using that feature of tokopedia wasn't even successful, maybe because of price error. But I tried again, and still not even progressing at all. Track record is useless too and CLEO's certain feature is not helpful at all. Any Choice will let you pick 3 items for a free shipping I did that but my order is nowhere. I don't even know if the seller is processing my order.
replayContent: We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with our app. We appreciate your feedback and would like to assist you in resolving the issue. Please provide us with your order details via app help center so that we can investigate and ensure that your order is processed correctly.

content: Can't view comments on reviews. Uninstalling and reinstalling didn't help. Ugly UI (very cluttered) and definitely NOT user-friendly. Already disliked an item, yet the app kept on suggesting it to me. Gives "estimated time" for delivery but goes over the range and blames the holiday season (that should never be a reason for delay, should've already identified potential problems and have a solution ready).
replayContent: We apologize for the inconvenience. We are continuously working to improve the app's user interface and functionality. Please ensure that you have the latest version installed. If the issue persists, please reach out to our support team for further assistance.

content: tokopedia itself is a good shopping app. It's the recurring problem with the courriers that's the main issue. No way to contact them, yet they would label cancelled/fail delivery attempt without even reaching out. Sometimes they deliver on work days despite the delivery address being specified as "home". Not the buyer's fault, really. tokopedia courriers should just put their contact numbers so we can reach out to them during delayed or late delivery attempts.
replayContent: We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced. We understand the frustration caused by canceled or failed delivery attempts without any notification. We value your feedback and will work towards improving the communication between our couriers and customers for a better delivery experience. Please contact us via customer service.

content: The refund process is convenient now if there are mistakes to the item sent by the seller. The cancellation process is almost instant when changing payment method. Keep up the good quality. However, please resolve the ongoing issues with Flash Express now, due to issues of changing of parcels in sorting facilities, or failed delivery attempts but there are no delivery attempts made to the address.
replayContent: Thank you for your positive feedback and for bringing the ongoing issues with Flash Express to our attention. We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Our team is working on resolving these issues to ensure a smoother delivery experience for our customers.

content: In my type of hectic schedule and unable to look around for the perfect items that I need for everyday use. tokopedia is the perfect platform that I discovered, and the advantages in this app, a lot of sales , cheaper prices, and good offers, you will rcvd. I never encountered any scam in this app because you can review the star, comments, and pictures of the other consumer that already bought the item. Friendly user and a lot of rewards. Enjoy to your add to cart and shopping!

We're glad you appreciate the great deals, user-friendly interface, and the added security of being able to review other customers' experiences. Happy shopping and thank you for choosing tokopedia!

content: Opening the app pauses any media on the background with this recent 1.1 update. The filter by ratings is still missing. Dark Mode is still broken especialy with some item pictures being inverted and descriptions and reviews not being in Dark Mode. Dark Mode can also be improved by using brighter white text for better contrast.

content: When there's an issue with your order and cancellation is needed, they will cancel it and will put any reason that will put the blame to buyer. I've waited 1 month for my order only to be cancelled due to "incorrect delivery address" even though a hundred orders have been successfully delivered to the address they marked "incorrect". Terrible customer service. The chatbot is completely useless. Refund process takes way too long.

We strive to provide excellent customer service and we would like to make things right for you. Please reach out to our support team so we can assist you further and ensure a smooth resolution.

content: For the most part I find tokopedia very good .. items are usually what they purport to be and customer service is usually friendly and helpful once you can beat Cleo into submission and actually talk to someone. There have been occasional issues with the software for returns and a somewhat overtly Rigid system which does not address or admit to errors..but my overall experience has been positive and would recommend the platform as an online shopping destination...but Delivery charges need work!

content: I absolutely love the tokopedia app with the attractive promos and games. The interface is very good but it is a bit bloated and slow. It slows down my device especially when olaying Merge Boss. I also hate CLEO, wont let me talk to customer service, and the search engine is outright bonkers. It gives out seemingly unrelated items to your search term which is a stupid annoyance when I am looking for something very specific. Would be nice to get those fixed
replayContent: We're glad to hear that you're enjoying the promos and games on the tokopedia app! We apologize for any inconvenience caused by its performance and search engine. Our team is continuously working on improving the app's speed and search accuracy. We appreciate your feedback and will take it into consideration for future updates.

content: Used to be unable to search purchase history inapp but that has been resolved. I think the app is decent but whoever decides to put a 200 item limit on wishlist should be fired. Other shopping apps don't do that. The result is that I end up buying wayyyyyy less as I keep losing track of the items I'm interested in. Poor decision making. Boo.

content: Too spammy. The app auto-launch even if I don't intentionally open. Maclick ko lang accidentally yung link nila, bukas agad. It interupts anything I'm doing to the point it lags my phone. I prefer the web version na lang. Edit: there is no such thing disable autolaunch on your setting. It's hard to find and navigate if it did exist. Uninstalled again

content: I really like this app for its abundance of vouchers, particularly catered towards new users. content: Bad customer service. Cannot recommend tokopedia. content: Ordered wine for Xmas. Seller is useless, and partial shipped easy to obtain stuff. Cannot cancel the unshipped order as it's partial. When you try and cancel one by one site reports error. content: The app itself uses more battery than playing games on your phone. Why is that? Why can't you program an app that resizes properly for tablets or folding phones or even when rotating views. content: For the longest time now, tokopedia is really NOT competitive with the delivery and order cancellation of products due to failed delivery by the courier. I've had multiple encounters of the same scenario and reported a few but tokopedia still does not seem to know about this or just blindly allowing them to do just that. Very unprofessional!

content: Highly suspicious. I wanted to top up and it says in their system that I've already reached their limit monthly which is 100k. content: the delivery on this app is slower than a sloth, if you can't deliver on time just close your damn app. Its been weeks since i ordered something from this app and it still hasn't come and keep in mind that it wasn't even an overseas order, the sellers are often rude and slow even taking weeks to ship an order. content: Customer Care now is not like before. content: There is no way to turn off notifications. Or the option is exceptionally well hidden from the user. I do not want advertisement pushed to my phone. Uninstalling this adware. UPDATE: in reply to developers; No that's simply untrue. For starters you have the name of the menu options wrong. There is no menu called notification settings". If you go in to "messages" settings and turn off all of the "keep me informed about deals blah blah" you will STILL get push notifications from the app."
replayContent: Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback about the issue you have encountered on the tokopedia App. We value your business with us and will address this issue as quickly as possible. Thank you for your honest feedback and for bringing this issue to our attention.

content: Your ads keep popping everywhere, everytime! ð Really annoying plus only a limited "free shipping" or none at all and coins aren't really useful coz you can't use it to discount your order (limited redemptions in selected items only), they'll just expire without even using it. ð Gotta reinstall it after, if you will improve your app for better and hassle free online shopping!

Good app, search not good, though that's probably because I'm using English, which isn't really what it's designed for. Latest version - 6.38.2 - very slow to load and buttons (especially Track Package) often need hit multiple times. I'd revert to the previous version if I knew how. Edit 29/12 suddenly the speed is back to normal, no new version, so it must be something they've done on server. Thanks tokopedia, much appreciated.

Overall it's a really great app and is easy to understand and use. The service is also excellent for me. But I just gotta say that your ads on all other websites and apps ARE TOO annoying. Clicking skip or X just sends people to your app and it is annoying. I have already installed it and often uses it in a desired time but forcefully sending people there is too much. Especially if your ads always appear.
replayContent: Thanks for the feedback! The ads originate from third-party websites that promote our platform without our consent. We do not authorize or tolerate such advertising. We will share this with our team so they can review and take action on this.

content: I used to like tokopedia but lately this app, and the services this company provides, has gone from bad to worse. The app has become so cluttered with non-functional features. Orders appear on both "To Ship" and "To Receive" menus. The reward or coin system is a mess. Searching for the features you need has become so difficult because of all the unnecessary "features" that doesn't even work. I suggest keeping things simple. Less is more (as long as all features are functional).

Overall, this app is good. The only problem is that whenever u visit a store, there'll be a "follow the store" banner appear below the screen. It doesn't really annoys me that much because the size is small and didn't block the screen too much. The only thing is when that appears, the whole screen freezes preventing me from scrolling and tap anything on the screen besides the "follow" button. U can't skip or decline, and the only choice is to wait for it to disappear. It's kinda annoying tbh...

The tokopedia app continually makes my shopping life easier. It is user-friendly, all the discount vouchers easily be seen, navigation in the pages are so smooth. The arrangement of the categories are simple. The colors of the app vary depending on the theme or occasion and are always cool to the eyes, making it more easy for the shoppers to browse through the pages. I also love that the spacing between the displays are not that little nor too big. Overall, I would rate it more than 5 stars!ð

App seems to have improved a bit but there were major flaws on it. One is the fact that you have to view each message on the message tab for it to be marked as read in which unlike before that you just have to view it visually even without clicking one. If you haven't opened the app for quite a while you'll have to view it all. Second was that you need to scroll all the way up in the flash sale to view the next one. Lastly, denominations and payment for prepaid load changed a lot negatively. T_T

I do like the small improvements of app UI compared to the older version. However, I still find it annoying that notifs are all over the place, and most of the items and videos on feeds showned are irrelevant to what the user is browsing. The item sales, coupons for discounts and free shipping are pretty much rewarding, which makes the shopping experience nice. As for the delivery, it is fairly fast.
replayContent: Hey, Jezreel Fernandez! Thanks for the review. We are always open to any criticism, both positive and negative. We will keep on working on improving our app to make it better for you. Please feel free to share your thoughts via our app feedback section.

content: The search system and UI got worse. When one searches from price high to low, it does not at all. It starts from cheap items, rather than actually high prices. Also, the search does not go for actual keywords properly. It feels like the search system specifically features a specific store or item, rather than try to find what the customer is looking for. Next, for some reason, the View all products in a store page is gone as well. It only allows one to view store, new, and customer gallery.

Lots of vouchers and delivery is fast. Although there are times that it is confusing. They should put a range of all the prices when there are different types of products in one posting. Sometimes I thought the price was the same regardless of the size or type. And I get frustrated when I realize that the one I'm eyeing for is actually much more expensive than my initial expectation and budget just because of the price posted (which is always the cheapest from the selection).
replayContent: Hi, Abby C! Your feedback helps us get on the right track. Thanks for the review, we'll pass it right to our team. Stay with us to see the following updates!

content: Intrusive and disruptive ads. Pop-up brings you here without your click/touch. I would let it slide if it was a visible banner click, but no. Either automatic or invisible ad click. As for experience, its an alternative to Shoppee when you can't find what you're looking for. They didn't show bad reviews so you'll have to gamble a bit. If you end up with a terrible item, just suck it up. Customer service wasn't helpful. But that's from over two years ago. Maybe things are better now. 54th

1. have to keep clicking on the product search bar and clicking the "x" button while looking for my shopping list items. should be intuitive and when I click on the bar, it should just empty out 2. all buttons are too small for mobile use... some things (like delivery slot choosing) is just a link, not a button 3. I have to select all items in my cart before I can pay! it's in my cart! obviously I want to buy it! 4. I miss redmart! if possible get the same interface!

Buzzing, disorganized and confusing. I used to only have to use it to buy weird stuff on the cheap, so I didn't mind, but now I'm forced to use it instead of the reasonably intuitive Redmart app to buy my groceries and all the noise on the app drives me nuts. Furthermore, where are these vouchers I'm supposed to receive as a result of putting up with this inconvenient change???

content: I use to order from this store, I stop doing it because it takes a while for them to deliver my orders. Don't install the App, advertising pop-ups will be installed together with the App, it's Annoying.  It is best to order your items from Amazon especially for imported items, it is cheaper and that every item will be delivered on time or earlier even if it came from the other side of the world. Please note that theri tracking system is real, not like tokopedia which I think is not true, considering that even if the item had already been picked up by the local carrier as indicated, it would still take another 2 weeks for them to deliver, You'll be wondering as to who is informing you correctly. For your added information, you could pay Amazon using the Western Union outlets, that is if you don't have any credit card.

content: Terrible app/website. Many low quality products, many scammers, coupon codes are misleading (they never tell you all the terms and conditions, for example, the coupon can only be used for specific products - never mentioned), the checkout process is messy and you never know when the confirmation to pay is - every step says "confirm order" "paynow" - this way, you can never know when to check your order before you agree to the transaction. Absolutely terrible experience!

This company is fraudulent. They make getting refunds extremely difficult. They will refund you in store credit (e wallet) rather than your hard earned cash back into your bank account. And you're not able to take the money out of the e wallet, unless you activate it (By the way, this is refund is for an item they sold me that was out of stock). And then customer service ignores and avoids responding in order to fix said issue. This is fraudulent and untrustworthy.

A strange but good app, I have had mostly good luck with the products I have received thus far. The interface could definitely use some work as several aspects of it are very confusing. Sellers attempt to be deceptive with pricing, often times highlighting the full product but showing a low price for only a small portion. A rule should be implemented for sellers so that the featured picture for the product is the price shown and not the lowest price for only a partial product.
replayContent: We appreciate your kind words about the quality of the products you have received. content: Always refreshes and brings me back to the top. It's especially frustrating when you are browsing the flash sale or reading the reviews because you almost never get to the bottom then you have to start from the top again. I hope somebody fixes this for it is just too frustrating to navigate the app and it happens a lot if not all the time.

The app is great actually. It has a great design and layouts, but the concern is that the tracking of product is confusing. Why not put the address rather than a words or a sentence that isn't familiar. In addition, the product takes more than a lifetime to arrived. It might be that the delivery partner is the fault. Otherwise, the app is great but the tracking of parcel is confusing.
tokopedia is very helpful and very fast delivery...
Overall it is good, slightly different than TaoBao. Integrated with TNG is the part I really like.

content: App is good, no bugs so far. But I think it can use more polish. My device is an LG G6. So here is my constructive criticism: 1) The app's splash screen is an awful, pixelated orange and blue image. I'm not even sure what image it actually is. Every time I launch this app I'm turned off by the splash screen. 2) Allow paragraphing in the text box. Paragraphing will allow users to read reviews better. It makes writing points easier. Less of an eye strain too. Thanks!

Design and colors are trendy but you should provide an option for a simpler/cleaner interface for those who want it. Also, the market is oversaturated with generic Chinese products that it's such a chore to find anything. Prices are often higher too vs those listed on the competing app. I only ever use this app now when I can't find the product I want elsewhere.

content: I docked 2 stars because the refund scheme is flawed. If more than one item is ordered from the same seller and one of them has to be refunded, you can't select the single item. I have to message the seller just to followup on the status of delivery when it looks "stuck".

content: BUYER BEWARE! This company is terribly run. Talking to customer service is like talking to a parrot, they just repeat the situation. Moreover, the user interface is riddled with issues. There's a customer service number listed, expect you have to guess because the website doesn't actually tell you it's a phone number. Returning an item is a nightmare as well. The company gives no notifications and will void a return if you miss a deadline (even if the seller is willing to accept a return).
good quality,masarap idiot,comfortable,true size easy to wear,very convenient ang price,affordable nice ang product...

content: The app is great and its nationwide coverage is deeply appreciated but I hope they will find a way to lessen the shipping fees outside metro manila. I love to shop using tokopedia but the shipping fee is unbelievably expensive. It is the reason why I seldom use the app. For every product, you'll have to pay a shipping fee no matter how small it is (sometimes the shipping is even more expensive than the product itself).
replayContent: Thank you for your feedback. Please be informed that the shipping fee is now determined on a store-level cart. You can get free shipping once you meet the minimum spend required by the seller. Otherwise, a shipping fee will be applied based on the Weight of your item(s), Seller's origin and Customer's location.

content: My details are being exposed... I receive packages that I didn't order. The packages have my name and address as the receiver but when I open them I find items that I have never ordered. It was not an item that I ordered and was replaced by another but actually an item that I have never ordered. This has already happened twice. Atleast my real orders are being delivered.
replayContent: We truly understand your concern about this unexpected situation. Your privacy and security are our top priorities. Please reach out to our support team so we can investigate this matter further and find a solution together. We are here to assist you every step of the way.

content: There's a bug in the latest version. I've never have the app drain so much battery before this. As for the overall experience of the app. The UI is very confusing with each new campaign, there usually will be extra navigation added. Pop up features are often buggy, there need to be clear alternative ways to claim bonuses. Maybe a central profile that keeps track of everything can help keep things organized. Some features are not integrated together and feels weird how they work separately.

Worst. Not because of the app. But because of the advertisement they made when you watch ads (e.g. game). Fake 'close' button, forcing the playstore to open (i install), (when installed) they are forcing the app to open after the ads and the annoying part is, you need to tap 'yes' to close the app. Not double tap like other. Used to shop with them. But no more. Hopefully, they'll find a better marketing team on how to make ads a smart one, not cheesy and cheap and feels like desperate.
replayContent: Hi Faiz Suria! in order to support our operation, we display ads to promote our products and services. However, we are always collecting feedback and might change how we show ads if that affects our users too much. So, thank you for your feedback!

content: Searching is literally a pain, with irrelevant results most of the time. Some available products somehow went into invisible mode in the app, whereas they're there if you search for them using a browser. Navigation is decent but sometime the app struggle to load pictures etc (on and off smoothness). Not a pleasant shopping experience but it does the job somehow (nowhere near perfect of course, far from it).

There are some good deals on this app sometimes but the lack of product info are simply why I don't like to shop here much. When I finally do, I will get frustrated by the couriers services. tokopedia simply don't do any service control on their delivery partners when they already don't do any on their seller with regards to the product information part. Sellers help to ship out our order fast, end up getting stucked at OUR COURIER longer than an oversea shipment takes. How embarrassing!
replayContent: We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced. We understand the importance of accurate product information and timely delivery. We are constantly working to improve our app's product information and courier services to provide a better shopping experience for you. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

content: Poor customer service. It is not possible to contact them via email or chat, and contact can only be made by calling their landline number, which is not accessible to all customers. Parcels can remain in their logistics for several days or weeks without any customer support to provide updates on the status of your parcels. In my case, there was almost a week without any improvement in the shipping status of my parcel. Unfortunately, I will be uninstalling this app once all my parcels have arrive
replayContent: We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We understand your frustration and we're sorry for the delay in providing updates on your parcels. We are constantly working to improve our customer service and communication channels. Please be assured that we are taking your feedback seriously and will strive to do better in the future.

content: The app itself is quite heavy and clunky to be honest. I think you guys can make it much lighter and more organize if you wanted too. A Split Screen support will also be a welcome addition if it's added since I always search the product first to know if it's legit or not. Another thing is a Night Mode for the app. There are times when I browse at night and it really strain my eyes. A night mode would really be appreciated. And it's cool on my opinion.

The Redmart app on tokopedia is really so bad compared to how it was before. Everytime I search for something, click on the product, and then click Back, the list goes all the way up to the top again, so I have to start scrolling all over to get to where I was. App freezes constantly when adding quantities. Make it back to how it was please!

Customer service is unsatisfactory. The seller can't update their courier status. Moreover, their Laz are specialists can't do that either. The app still many bugs. I didn't input any phone numbers in writing a review but instead the model numbers I inputted was misjudged as phone numbers. Next, items have limited time to make a review. If you trace back and want to make a review, I will redirect to the page that the item you select isn't available anymore for review.

I haven't utilize the other features except for purchasing. Recently I tried to make use of the other apps features but it keeps crashing. I cannot even view the Help section in the Settings menu. I have the latest version installed which stated as 6.39.0. I tried to directly email the developer with the provided email address but the email wasn't delivered because the address couldn't be found, or is unable to receive mail.ð. What a mess.
This app is terrible, the order that I placed last month is still "to ship", like what is this?!! Is this app a joke? Why is it taking so long to ship my order tokopediað

content: Your advertisement keeep popping out blocking content on webpage I visit! I never give an app star review before but this has been plaguing me for almost a month now! To the actual review, the interface too cluttered and it is not easy to navigate. Price wise, not cheaper than your competitor. I tried to buy few things that are cheaper than anything in the market during sales. But the seller dont even bother to send me the stuff until it cancel the order by default. I uninstalled it immediately.

My buying experience is consistently made simpler by the tokopedia app. It is user-friendly, all the discount coupons are clearly visible, and the page navigation is really easy. The categories are arranged in a straightforward manner. The app's colors change based on the occasion or theme and are always pleasing to the eye, making it simpler for customers to traverse the sites. I also appreciate that the distances between the displays are neither too little nor too large. DEFINITELY 5 STARS FOR ME
At the moment, one of the better options as long as you know your way around online shopping. a lot of discount deals that are easier to get and a lot of fast transactions. very fast delivery too.

content: I really like this app. Very good platform for buyers and sellers. Five stars because it has everything you need and always on time. I'm hoping that it was just a glitch in the system. If it happens again, I'm backing off from tokopedia because I wouldn't want to order an item and recieve it as someone else.

Items I need are mostly available. they deliver them.promptly. The best thing is i can pay cash once the items are delivered not to worry about fraud on any charges to my credit card. The products have high quality.

content: After they updated the app, navigating through it is a chore. You need to open every section just to get to the point that you wanted. I literally did this when I was searching for my wishlist section and order tracking section. Either they hired someone that doesn't know the basics of having a friendly user interface, or they just cram everything what comes to mind. The website has much better interface than this app.

Pros: Most sellers ships out fast (my experience) Cons: The app is very buggy. If you enter it from an external page, it will repeatedly show that page even if you try to exit it. Its also very slow that I sometimes change my mins about buying since it takes ages to proceed. Viewing is very annoying too, sometimes I just want to check how my digital goods will cost it will set itself up in "my orders" to be paid. Lastly, it shows up in all types of ads (inclusing adware).

The app isn't amazing nor is it anything special. But it is however simple, direct and easy to use. I don't have any shopping issues so far. But with that said, i do however have an issue with the interface of the app. When i 1st downloaded it, it supported full screen display. But now after a few updates it's not supporting full screen and whats worse is it's getting smaller and smaller. I do hope that they solve this problem soon or it's gonna be 4 stars from me.
1) Camera function to take picture for review is not working after app update. 2) Message page is messier and harder to read after app update.

content: Order cannot cancel before shipped by seller.. Try to cancel the order many times because wrong address but i failed to cancel it.. Very worst experience ever..
replayContent: We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced. To resolve this issue, we recommend contacting our customer support team for assistance in canceling your order. Thank you for your understanding.

content: Worst App, not user friendly. Badly designed. I have purchased an item in tokopedia 10 days back which is supposed to be delivered within 6 days. There is no communication on order status and reason for delay. It is stuck in processing status for almost 10 days. When I tried to reach customer via chat box feature, no response at all. Seriously I'm pissed off and cancelled the order.

Not very user friendly. I've been using the competition app and so far, I'm not impressed with how to navigate the tokopedia app. The red alerts button is always on, even after you've reviewed orders. My cart also shows that I have something on there when I don't. The item page description, the reviews, even the search option is a mess. For a popular shopping app, they sure invest poorly on improving it.
So far I've found tokopedia to be scam free and reliable. Have to be careful what you buy though because, for example, the fabric may not be what you expect.
replayContent: At tokopedia we strive for making the best customer experience effortless. We apologize if we did not meet your expectations in this case. Please contact our CS Chat in the tokopedia App to help you with your case. We'll do our best to help you!

content: Complete info helps in deciding the best and appropriate items to choose before placing an order. Hoping all dealings will be easy and friendly.
replayContent: Hi, Yusop Ramli. Thank you for sharing with us. We pass all feedback, both positive and negative, to the team for reading. We hope you stay with us and see all the good changes!

content: The after purchase experience is good. But the search fuction is next to useless, unable to properly detect key words, its faster to search brand name and go through pages of items to find the model. Says a lot about their search. Lots of bugs regarding wish list, either it doesbt load, or its bugged out, greyed out most of my item. If compare with competitor like Shopee, a good after purchase experience alone is just not good enough.

The only reason I installed this app was because of Redmart. However, it is not as user friendly as compared to the old Redmart app. It is more difficult to browse and look for the things I want. I cannot sort the things based on 'savings', 'recently added' or in alphabetical order. The app seems so backward. It also hangs very often which is something I did not experience when using the old Redmart app in the past. I hope they can bring back the Redmart app. It is a mistake to shift to tokopedia.

RedMart integrated section needs improvement. When going to product screen from listing, it doesn't anchor back to where i was last browsing on the listing which is really inconvenient. Also, the UI showing merchant name under product screen is not obvious enough & doesn't allow me to click-through. Needs finetuning on UX, given RedMart app previously was high on usability.

App use is ok. But, the UI of the mobile app feels jarring ang cluttered. It makes it a little frustrating for me to navigate. It would also help if they give an option of "top sale" items in product searching rather than popularity since it feels like that the items shown only have more product views rather than more products sold.
Unable to see whether the products / items is from overseas or local. I've uninstall and reinstall it but it's still the same. Any solution?
replayContent: Thank you for your review! We apologize for the inconvenience. To address this issue, please make sure you have the latest version of the app installed. If the problem persists, kindly reach out to our customer support for further assistance.

content: It is my first time using your app. And I was so confused and I ended up buying two of the same item. There are too many emails and notifications from your app saying that my order will be cancelled if I didn't click Pay now" although I already checked my card and I was already charged for the first one. I clicked "PAY NOW" thinking that maybe may payment was still on pending ang wallah I ended up buying two of them. I do think that those notifications from your app needs to be stopped because it can be misleading to those inexperienced buyers. I am not asking to cancel my order and for a refund because fortunately someone is willing to buy the second item to me with the same price. I just want to share my 1st shopping experience with your app and it wasn't so good."
replayContent: Dear customer, we are sorry to hear that our services have fallen short of your expectations. Your feedback has been duly noted for future improvements of our services. Please contact our customer service officer if you have any query, our customer service numbers are Â PH: (02) 795 8900, SG: +65 3158 7424, and MY: 03 8601 188

content: I love using this app but after I downloaded the updated version, it was randomly removed from my installed apps, I installed it over and over again when I want to track my order. I don't know what's the real problem of it, my phone had a good specs and storage. I think it's a bug if I'm not mistaken. Developer, I want your help to fix this issue. I spend lots of data for this, and it's wasting my money buying for load. Thank you!

I really enjoy shopping at tokopedia. The convenience of not waiting in line at department stores, the traffic, and delivered right on your doorstep, just to name a few. However, some sellers aren't true to their claims on the products they sell. Images of products are done by professional photographer's. So everything looks good on pictures. Sometimes you don't really receive what you ordered. It's a shame! Please advice sellers otherwise. Thank you, tokopedia!!!

An alternative to Amazon. I am giving it a 4 star because it lacks two things. (1) It would be convenient for users if there is a permanent bar at the top or bottom screen that will link the page easily back to home, account, and cart, rather than using the back page function. (2) It needs to tied up with one or two permanent delivery companies. In order to be as efficient as Amazon, it must have consistency in deliveries. If the stock is in Singapore, the delivery must be less than 4 days.

Everything is clusterf**k, too many thing going on. I just want to shop, not play games and received so many random message. The website version is so scuffed you can't even use it when there's "wEird tRaffic" alerts every 5 minutes but everything is fine when you use the app version. But then the app version is just pure trash from search engine and sorting/filter options. Thank god Shopee dominate more than you guys. Totally not recommend.
Convenient & speedy shipment & delivery & reasonably priced items
replayContent: We appreciate your positive feedback! It's great to hear that you found our app convenient for shopping and that your orders arrived quickly. We strive to offer competitive prices to our customers. Thank you for choosing tokopedia!

content: What i like about tokopedia is its so easy to refund goods ...return if not satisfied

content: They have the worst delivery. It's either it will take forever or you won't ever get the item because delivery guys are impatient and they will automatically return the item to seller if you don't happen to answer their call through no fault of yours. They won't even text. When they started, tokopedia used to have high class service. I always trusted them even with more expensive items and they always exceeded expectations. Now, it's the other way around. It has become a joke of an online shop.

content: One of my orders (already paid) was tagged as Delivered by the LEX courier but I never received it. I've been trying to get help from the CS ever since to no avail, been sending them emails through the app by filling up the form countless times. There's also no option for the buyers to confirm order receipt in the app, thus giving us no control over delivery unlike Shopee. It's such a hassle to contact support that I've given up trying. There goes my money.

A lot of scammers. Not secure and also only have return and refund option instead of only refund options like shopee does. Does not protect the buyers from getting scam and instead make us go the extra length to get back our money by demanding us to return the useless piece of wrong item to a non existence place correctly. The interface was difficult and hard to navigate between good and bad shop's review. I won't be using this app anymore and also won't be recommending it to anyone.

This is the worst shopping app I've ever installed! My order details said that it was an unsuccessful delivery, when in fact I didn't get notified and I didn't even get an SMS. It's been weeks since I ordered something, and I got worried because there were still no calls or messages if the product was out of delivery. So when I checked the delivery details, I was frustrated because it had already been two failed attempts, when in fact I didn't get messages or calls from a rider.
replayContent: We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Our team is working on improving our notification system to ensure that you receive timely updates on your orders. We appreciate your feedback and would like to offer assistance in resolving this issue. Please contact our customer support for further assistance.

content: Some notifications are too damn late! It is so frustrating when it's about the very important ones. And on the confirmations of the orders, the confirm buttons were glitching, not sure if my orders were confirmed or not. Just great!!! Moreso, the messages and the track package in profile are not well-synced.
Damn scam withdrawal function. Tried withdrawal for 3 times and all failed. Gonna report this kpdnkk. Top up fast and way too to easy but withdraw took so long and difficult like hell

content: Force opening ads. Bad practice dude.. really bad.

content: Tracking order is harder to locate than older versions. it's bothersome because if i view "to receive", all my order history will be showed. i can only view the complete shipping process right at the bottom of the "my orders" which is only 5 notification. if i want to view my past transaction and it didn't appear on that 5, i wouldn't be able to view them. ð

Order status is confusing, still prefer the old version which you can really see the detailed info about the location/status of your order. Also I find my tokopedia app always encountering delay on pulling up the items that I'm searching or looking for and even the app itself, its kinda slow. Hope you can fix this. Looking forward in enjoying this app again.

When it comes to the service, no problems for me. But I gotta say, UI has been bad for years. I appreciate the latest UI design upgrade, but I'm afraid the app is still very messy. My "Wishlist" has 150+ items but, everytime I check, it shows "no items". Sometimes it'll show up through switching of categories then back to wishlist again. If it does show up, it's hard to find the latest added items due to the lack of "sort" feature. Been using this for 2yrs, UI still an issue. Hope it get fixed.
I am so annoyed with the ads and pop ups

tokopedia plants virus to popup advertisement and automatic redirection. Please ban this app

content: Hate this app. Cannot select text to translate. Cannot zoom in on pictures to see details. You are FORCED to download it because every single damn link makes the play store open. Reliable, easy to use, lots of discounts every month fast and free shipping must have!!!

content: This app is one of my favorite shopping app. But then, they have a poor service. The courier (delivery riders) always cancel and reschedule the delivery. And because of that, even though I am in need of it already (my order), I can't do anything other than wait again for rescheduling of the delivery of my parcel. What's with you tokopedia? Are you really committed to delivering it on time? And if you reschedule it then why do you not compromise? It's ridiculous.
replayContent: We're sorry to hear about your experience. We understand the frustration caused by delivery delays and cancellations. We are constantly working with our courier partners to improve our delivery service to ensure a more reliable and convenient experience for our customers.

content: The constant stream of spam in Google notifications is annoying. The app ignores notifications categories, they send spam even if only Orders notifications are allowed. When disabling notifications, they start nagging in app every 5 minutes to enable them. No respect for customer wishes. Makes me want to uninstall this app and use Shopee instead. To respond to the developer, when I disable all types of messages in the app except Orders, I still receive promotion spam in notifications. Oops.
replayContent: We apologize for the inconvenience you've experienced with our app's notifications. Please try updating the app to the latest version as we've made improvements in this area to address the issue of receiving unwanted spam notifications.

content: The search image function is too hard to use, I want to select from my gallery, but it doesn't organize per album. But rather, every image I have is in one place scattered randomly. I can't find the image I want. Fixed this stupid system.
replayContent: We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced. We recommend organizing your images into folders on your device as a workaround for easier selection within the app.

content: I already uninstall this app but I received a parcel? I don't have any order and nothing shows in transaction history! How can yoy expect me to cancel it? What kind of app is this? So disappointing!

content: ADVERTISEMENTS ARE TOO INVASIVE. I want to receive ads, but not like how you do them. I can tweak them via settings, but the settings need more in-depth options, so I am uninstalling. Shopee is a much superior app.
replayContent: We appreciate your feedback on the advertisements. You can adjust your ad settings in the app. Your suggestions for more detailed ad options will be forwarded to our development team. Thank you for your input.

content: Logistics is quite expensive but the items are well and securely packed and really fast delivery even for overseas items they will be at your doorstep 9-10 days. Unlike with the other online shopping app usage of vouchers is easy and has a wide variety of vouchers and discount coupons. For fragile items that need extra care for logistics I prefer to buy it here in tokopedia.

Very bad payment process with tokopedia wallet. Top up did not work although I did it 4 times. and you could not change payment method. Had to cancel all orders and order all again. What a pain. This is my first app review cause I could not accept this kind of most difficult payment. Online shopping should be easy. This was my most frustrated online shopping experience.
response fast on goods cancel and return, supply goods as per show in website. keep customers know the delivery process.
affordable price and lots of promos

content: tokopedia this year 2024 was the worst customer service you cannot talk to the live agent about your corcern always cleo AI and rider automatic cancelled my order even it is the first day attemp, cleo said it must be 3 tries to deliver but how come it was cancelled in one day and theres no form to fill up about this scenario I cannot report this rider, this must be zero star for me

content: It's so intrusive it's so annoying! It's the most common ad that tricks you into clicking it with a fake close button. Id you don't have it installed it redirects to the playstore to install, if installed it opens the app. Now an even more annoying feature has been added! The app has no permission allowed, not even allowed to display over apps but frequently will play ads on your screen! No notifs just a random ad if you have it installed! I had to uninstall this malware app at this point!

content: Search experience is good, most of the time you can find what you're looking for. However, the notification setting is bugged. When you preset the notification you want to receive, the app ignores your preset and just sends you everything. The notification frequency is maddening, it's like being haunted by crazy ex. CS is a joke too. Forever forced to deal with CLEO chatbot, can't reach any human assistance. At least have the option to speak with a human agent.
Great app, But I have a problem with sending picture through chat. It saids "message failed to send"

You can also try restarting the app and your device to troubleshoot the problem.

content: Buggy app and poor support. It shows Sorry something went wrong from our side" everytime i try yo place order. Contacted customer support but no solution was given. In the end i figured out myself that it was due to 2 types of shipping from the same store is causing the issue. Wasted my time and effort. Give 2 stars because overall it is still a decent app for shopping."

I uninstalled your app coz your ads are everywhere. It automatically opens your app and displays over other apps. I understand your need to advertise. But it is just too much. It operates like a virus, like a software bug. It is too annoying that instead of wanting to use your app, I uninstalled it instead. I know you can do better. Your bug like advertising is definitely a waste of your money and a shameful excuse of a marketing style. Your marketing needs some serious help.

content: the delivery is slow. my parcel still on the same place for a day. why dont you just adding more delivery staff? estimated date? from 1/3 you just change it to 5/3.

content: tokopedia platform by itself is convenient. The app is getting more & more bloated every update. TERRIBLE performance issue. It takes up a lot of space. 400+ MB! Suggested items should be a link instead of loading automatically at the bottom of the main page. Content is cluttered. "View all orders" should be an icon, not as a text link.

The Payment method is too complicated and annoying, When you want to pay then you have to wait for the number to be send but if you quit the app to check the bank or message and reopen the app it's stary back at the homepage all over again and you have to find it again. And I still didn't find the last page I open so I had to cancel my order and pay it at 7 Eleven. What a waste of time!!

Overall disappointing app. Slow. Unnecessarily large download. Full of ads. Shows unavailable items (out of stock) Can't filter on origin, on available payment methods. Limitation on wishlist items? Why? Who made the business decision to limit the amount of items you are allowed to your wishlist? Navigation un intuitive. Would give 0 stars.
Update: Now that the error has been fixed, it has now managed to resume the high quality performance of the app for the benefit of the many users of this app. Very much thanks, tokopedia!

content: Items now are priced low & very much affordable

content: Hello! I have a few suggestions on some useful features you may add to your application. I would like to suggest a "sold" count on the products. So that we may know how many of these products have been sold. This helps us guarantee how reliable the seller is based on how many people purchase their products. My second suggestion is another delivery option. Your shipping fee is always the same amount and compared to your competitors, you have a much more expensive shipping fee.

Great shopping app. Unlike Shopee, I can use my foreign card here and buy stuff despite being overseas. App needs improvement though. Should be able to update/choose payment options at account settings and not at checkout. I was being skeptical when I'm about to order a gift for my girlfriend and there are no payment options. It just says "Place Order" at checkout. I didn't know that it's gonna take me to the payment options page after that. I didn't want my recipient get billed you know.

I have been using the app for a while now without much issues. However, recently I noticed the search function is completely useless. You search for a specific product and you get multiple unrelated garbage. As an example, I search for "lego 10283", I get everything else except the actual product. This has to be fixed, that's the whole point of having a search function.
Was great from 2012 to 2022! 2023 till now very poor customer service, as of we're hired from slums, very ignorant and incompetent, lots of glitches in this app recently.
replayContent: We apologize for the poor customer service experience and glitches you've encountered. We strive to provide excellent service and have taken note of your feedback to improve our app. Please bear with us as we work to resolve these issues.

content: This App is super awesome! when i first download it i thought i have to pay for the shipping fee but I'm surprised that i didn't need to, btw i love this app so much

content: When the app was updated automatically 3 days ago, the app could not go further than the first page. It freezes. Until today I could not access my wallet and account. Please rectify immediately. Today, 29 May 2020, the app was updated again, but it still freezes and not responding. It is becoming frustrating. The issue is still not resolved. On both of my phones. I am giving up on you.

Significantly slower than the browser experience. (Takes a long time to load items and my orders.) Has constant and obnoxious app notifications throughout the day. (Your voucher is expiring! Your voucher is expiring! 285 days to go before your voucher expires! Sale now! Sale now! Your voucher is expiring!) I could turn off notifications, but then I wouldn't get DELIVERY notifications, and with the slower response time than the browser experience, there is no point keeping the app on my phone.

I had to pay the shipping fee three times because the items that I ordered simultaneously were delivered on different dates. My problem is why can't tokopedia just wait for the other two items, because it is there on the app check out that I only have to pay one shipping fee. I even ordered online with the thought of saving money but I was charged with multiple shipping fees. It turns out to be a waste of money. I'll give two stars since the products are legit.

It's a good shopping app. The only problem is the coin. It's only applicable to selected products unlike to shoppee app you can use your coins in any product also you can use your coin when purchasing a load. But here in tokopedia you can't use your coin to buy a load...I'm really disappointed to this app..

content: tokopedia's simply A GREAT help when shopping online. Thanks!

What's with those permissions? They're not necessary for a shopping app, right? But given your track record on ads on websites, I wouldn't be surprised if these permissions are used to gather data. Additionally, the app is slow, always says an error occurred, and it takes up hundreds of megabytes on storage. Worst of all, you're forced to use the app on some features.

The app and customer service itself is good. Customer service responsive. However, a lot of items are cheap quality and 2 - 3 sizes smaller than advertised. The return and refund process is a PITA. Do not buy tech, but there are some really good and reputable sellers on here, just don't go for the too good to be true pricing. Multiple payment options as well.
